attributes.action: Remove Value Added Tax On Goods and Services supplied to the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By Removing VAT from goods and services to the nhs would help business and the nhs to streamline accounting procedures. Value added tax on an essential service has to be imoral.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove Value Added Tax On Goods and Services supplied to the NHS."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11140.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/no-nhs-vat/
